content.prompt: Which of the following describes a major difference between northern humanists and Italian humanists?

choices.label: Italian humanists focused on human intellect and achievements, whereas northern humanists concentrated on nature and emotion.
Italian humanists focused on national consciousness, whereas northern humanists rejected politics.
Italian humanists viewed human nature as corrupt and weak, whereas northern humanists viewed human nature as generally good.
Both concentrated on spiritual concerns, but northern humanists also focused on secular matters
Both looked to classical sources, but northern humanists also emphasized Christian sources.
